类 Words

  • java.lang.Object
    • Words

  • public class Words
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to provides random words from 3 categories or read word from specified external TXT file.

      • randomWord

        public static java.lang.String randomWord(int category)
        Provides a random word from one of 3 categories.
        参数:
        category -
        返回:
        a word in chosen catrgory.

      • randomWord

        public static java.lang.String randomWord(java.lang.String wordsource)
        Check the file exsists and ends with ".txt". Use bufferd reader to read valid words in lines. Provide a random word from this file.
        参数:
        wordsource - file name
        返回:
        a word from the file
